oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Various statements are given with regard to the nature and movements of the celestial bodies. The first of these treats of the Moon and Stars, ending with the “Bushman–rice” Star Canopus...the second treats of Sun, Moon, and Stars (B II. 377–379); and the third, of the same (L II.–1. 214 and 215)
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sun, Moon, and stars
